page.title: 20A SUMMARY OF HOLTON-LE CLAY
page.content:
During the last 40 years the population of Holton-le-Clay has grown rapidly. This is mainly due to Industry on the Humber Bank, North Sea Oil and British Gas Terminals. The average price of property is one of the lowest in the country. Another contributing factor is the low rates compared to neighbouring Humberside over the last eleven years. Many families stay in the area only a short time because of change of occupation or because of lack of amenities in the village.
{Taking part in this Domesday {Survey were children from the Third {and Fourth years of Holton-le-Clay {Junior School.
